issue.title: [C++] MakeArrayOfNull fails on extension types with a nested storage type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15241](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15241). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I detected this as part of the PR to switch over to the async scanner as the async scanner always creates an empty array as a placeholder.  Some python tests using extension types with nested types then started failing.
